In Section ??, we integrate completely all the obtained equations and end up with a noninvariant so- lution of which is a general form of the solution invariant under the first nonlocal symmetry in the hierarchy. In Section ??, we use this solu- tion for constructing the corresponding (anti-)self-dual gravitational metrics with either Euclidean or neutral signature. 2 Real variables and 2-component form of CMA In our earlier paper [?] we presented bi-Hamiltonian structure of the two- component version of (??), which by Magri’s theorem [?] proves that it is a completely integrable system in four dimensions.
